the operator is a short but sweet game about assisting fbi agents while on cases and uncovering a deeper conspiracy   the main gameplay is a mix of investigating cases using your fbi database and tools and spotting contradicting parts of evidence i enjoyed both the gameplay and the plot and recommend this for anyone that thinks they would be interested
